titleStmt.title: By the Committee of Safety of the Common-wealth of England, Scotland, and Ireland. A proclamation touching the summoning of a Parliament
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Committee of Safety.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills, and John Field, printers to the Committee of Safety,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Whitehall this 14. day of December. 1659.
Steele notation: condition ment hope; Arms 51a.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
